name: df-lnfn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(clf, crab(s0, co(cc, cmap, chba), wral(s1, cc, wral(s2, chba, wral(s3, chba, wceq(cfv(cv(s0), co(co(cv(s1), csm, cv(s2)), cva, cv(s3))), co(co(cv(s1), cmul, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2))), caddc, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s3)))))))))
comment: Define the set of linear functionals on Hilbert space. (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
